title: Vector Team Started on Development!
detail: We started on exploring things beyond HTML and CSS. It is a great venture which we enjoy! Thanks for people who supported us.

title: Updated New Contents!
detail: We finished our first two posts! Working on getting together for more articles!

title: Trying REACT for the First Time
detail: Our front end developer is exploring react! Tough time when there is no one to reach out directly, but we can figure this out by resources on the internet! Go Vector!

title: Updated Team Intro
detail: In our vector team page, we uploaded our vector team member introduction cartoons! It is pretty entertaining and has thoroughly introduced our members. To check that out, just click on any vector logo throughout our site!
